text: There's an ancient version of manager.xml located in webapps/host-manager; looks like it's been there for some years.  Doesn't appear to hurt, but it's not doing anything useful.
creator: chuck.caldarale@unisys.com

text: That file looks fine to me. It is intended to be used by the host manager to add a manager app to a newly created host.
creator: markt@apache.org
